review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Phase 4 extras: Deleted dead multi-project-dashboard.js (707 lines, no imports). Status-strip idempotency guard (prevents double-init). Cost indicator moved to status bar (replaces removed cost-alert-badge). Waiting segment hidden when zero (CSS + existing JS classList.toggle). updateCostIndicator properly handles null/0/alert states. 93 suites / 2996 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
